content.raw:
Can we merge this? Only things changed are print function and str unicode renaming but unicode was used mostly everywhere anyway.

The python 3 changes to resample should have no effect on python 2 and are tested on mac and windows. 

As for linux @cbillington could you maybe to a quick check that everything is working on linux?
content.html:
Can we merge this? Only things changed are print function and str unicode renaming but unicode was used mostly everywhere anyway.

The python 3 changes to resample should have no effect on python 2 and are tested on mac and windows.

As for linux @cbillington could you maybe to a quick check that everything is working on linux?
